original_title: Sri Lanka shares up in mid day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka‘s shares edged up in mid day trade on Friday, Colombo Stock Exchange data showed.
The main All Share Price Index was up 0.30 percent or 26.59 points to 8,793.93, the most liquid index S&P SL20 was up 0.62 percent or 15.37 points to 2,490.48.
Top gainers during mid day trade were Sampath Bank, Commercial Bank and LOLC Finance. (Colombo/June09/2023)
